text.div:
Claim Medicare Non Payment Reason Code

The reason that no Medicare payment is made for services on an institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmmdcrnonpmtrsn_cd

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/clm-mdcr-non-pmt-rsn-cd

name: Claim Medicare Non Payment Reason Code
description: The reason that no Medicare payment is made for services on an institutional claim. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_mdcr_non_pmt_rsn_cd
